findings.title: approve Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The approve function has a vulnerability.

findings.title: Insecure Transfer Functions
findings.description: Multiple private transfer functions (_transferStandard, _transferToExcluded, _transferFromExcluded, _transferBothExcluded) are found without proper access control, potentially leading to unauthorized token transfers.

findings.description: N/A

findings.title: burn
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected swap functions
findings.description: Multiple unprotected swap functions are present in the contract, which can lead to potential security risks.
findings.function: swapExactTokensForTokens, swapTokensForExactTokens, swapExactETHForTokens, swapTokensForExactETH, swapExactTokensForETH, swapETHForExactTokens

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: sync
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables
findings.description: The constructor of the contract does not initialize state variables.

findings.title: <Constructor>
findings.description: The constructor function has been declared as public, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: openTrading
findings.description: The openTrading function has an external access modifier and can only be called by the owner.

findings.title: setZeroBuyTaxmode
findings.description: The setZeroBuyTaxmode function has been identified as an external function with onlyOwner access control.

findings.title: setNewRouter
findings.description: External function setNewRouter allows onlyOwner to modify the router address.

findings.title: Increase Allowance Vulnerability
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: excludeFromReward
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function has a potential vulnerability as it can be called by the owner only.

findings.title: _approve
findings.description: Private function _approve has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: _transfer
findings.description: Multiple private functions with _transfer prefix found, potentially leading to unauthorized asset transfer.

findings.title: swapTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in swap tokens functionality.

findings.title: sendETHToFee
findings.description: Receiving Ether without checking the sender can lead to loss of funds.
